items.title: Danger Growing: What Would War with N. Korea Look Like?
items.description: The U.S. is conducting a missile defense test today after North Korea fired off yet another threatening missile Monday.  Pyongyang launched a Scud-class missile into the sea, the latest in a fast-paced series of missile tests defying international pressure and threats of more sanctions.

items.title: IN MEMORY: 'Old Guard' Places 280,000+ Flags at Arlington Cemetery
items.description: This weekend millions of Americans pause on Memorial Day to honor the nation's heroes and reflect on the sacrifices of its fallen soldiers. In that vein, soldiers from the 3rd Infantry Regiment placed flags this week at more than 280,000 graves of fallen service members.

items.title: Six Babies! Couple Welcomes Sextuplets After 17-Year Struggle with Infertility
items.description: Adeboye and Ajibola Taiwo of Richmond, Virginia, recently became parents to sextuplets. The Nigerian couple tried for 17 years to have children. In November they were overjoyed when doctors told them they detected four heartbeats on their first ultrasound. But in January, they learned they were expecting two more babies, for a total of six.
items.summary: Adeboye and Ajibola Taiwo of Richmond, Virginia, recently became parents to sextuplets. The Nigerian couple tried for 17 years to have children.
